description: Grants the user the ability to create a spherical domain called 'Room' within which they can manipulate the spatial orientation of anything, perform surgical operations, and freely rearrange objects and people. The user becomes a 'Modification Human.'

users.circumstances: Law ate the fruit at some point in his past (exact circumstances not yet revealed in Episode 398)

abilityReveals.description: Creates a spherical domain in which the user has complete control over the placement and orientation of all objects and people.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Law creates a Room and uses it to swap a Marine's head with a cannonball while keeping the Marine alive, demonstrating the surgical nature of his powers.

abilityReveals.description: Within the Room, Law can freely manipulate the positions of objects and body parts, performing impossible surgical feats.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Law separates a Marine's head from his body and replaces it with a cannonball, yet the Marine remains conscious and alive.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.strength: Can perform surgical operations without causing pain or death
strengths.description: Law's abilities allow him to manipulate bodies in ways that would normally be fatal, but his victims remain alive and conscious.
Within his Room, Law has godlike control over the positioning and arrangement of all matter.

description: Grants the user the ability to generate and manipulate magnetic forces, allowing them to attract and repel metallic objects at will. The user becomes a 'Magnetism Human.'

users.circumstances: Kid ate the fruit at some point in his past (exact circumstances not yet revealed in Episode 398)

abilityReveals.description: The ability to attract metallic objects toward the user using magnetic force.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Kid uses magnetic force to stop an incoming cannonball mid-flight.

abilityReveals.description: The ability to repel metallic objects away from the user with great force.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Kid redirects the cannonball back at the Marines' artillery with even greater velocity than it arrived, destroying their mortars.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.strength: Control over metal weapons and projectiles
strengths.description: Kid can manipulate enemy weapons, turning their attacks against them.

strengths.strength: Can increase the force of redirected projectiles
strengths.description: Kid can send metal objects back with greater force than they arrived.
